details.user_input:
You are participating in a multi-agent collaboration workflow.
Use the context packet below as the source of truth for capabilities, tools, and current state.
Decide your own approach for this step; do not call other agents directly.
If another agent is needed, emit a need request. Either of these formats is accepted:
- JSON: {"needs": [{"target": "AgentName", "request": "..."}]}
- Text: [AgentName] concrete request
Provide handoff-ready output for this step.

Workflow Context Packet:
{
  "workflow": {
    "workflow_id": "cf177c9d15814682bf140f2270f1e135-dddfbbb7",
    "current_step": 2,
    "total_steps_hint": 4,
    "assigned_agent": "PaperAnalyst"
  },
  "task": {
    "goal": "Find academic papers that predict or analyze Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations and analyze the papers to extract key insights regarding the factors influencing Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations.",
    "expected_deliverable": "Key insights from academic papers on Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations.",
    "tool_hints": [
      "scrape_papers_with_mcp",
      "load_paper_memory_with_mcp",
      "query_paper_memory"
    ]
  },
  "request": {
    "user_input": "대한민국, 2026년 2월",
    "conversation_history": "user: 최근 2주간의 삼성전사 주식 가격 변동에 대해 뉴스랑 증권사 리포트 찾아서 분석하고 내용 정리해서 슬랙 agentic 채널에 올려줘\nassistant: 진행을 일시 중단하고 사용자 응답을 기다립니다.\n\nAsk user which region/time range should be prioritized.\nuser: 대한민국, 2026년 2월"
  },
  "state": {
    "prior_results": "[Step 1 - WebSearchAnalyst]\nOkay, I need to find news articles and brokerage reports related to Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations in South Korea during February 2026. I will use `search_web_candidates_with_mcp` to find relevant URLs and then `fetch_web_page_with_mcp` to extract the text from the most promising candidates.\n\nHere are my query candidates:\n1. \"Samsung Electronics stock price February 2026 South Korea\"\n2. \"삼성전자 주가 2026년 2월 대한민국\" (Korean for \"Samsung Electronics stock price February 2026 South Korea\")\n3. \"Samsung Electronics stock report February 2026 South Korea\"\n4. \"삼성전자 증권 리포트 2026년 2월 대한민국\" (Korean for \"Samsung Electronics securities report February 2026 South Korea\")\n5. \"Samsung stock news February 2026 South Korea\"\n6. \"삼성 주식 뉴스 2026년 2월 대한민국\" (Korean for \"Samsung stock news February 2026 South Korea\")\nThe initial search results are not very promising. Most of them are links to the Samsung community or general Samsung pages. I will try fetching the two links that are in Korean to see if they provide relevant information.\nBoth of the fetched pages are general Samsung website pages and don't contain information about Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations in February 2026. The search results are not providing relevant information. Since the original request was for news articles *and* brokerage reports, I will focus my queries on brokerage reports specifically. I will also try a broader search without the specific month.\n\nHere are my new query candidates:\n1. \"Samsung Electronics stock report 2026 South Korea\"\n2. \"삼성전자 증권 리포트 2026 대한민국\"\n3. \"Samsung stock analysis 2026 South Korea\"\n4. \"삼성 주식 분석 2026 대한민국\"\nThe search results continue to be dominated by irrelevant links to the Samsung community and general Samsung pages. It is possible that there is limited information available online about Samsung Electronics stock specifically for February 2026, as it is still in the future. Given the lack of relevant web results, I will request a search for academic papers.\n\nAdditional Needs:\n- [PaperAnalyst] Find academic papers that predict or analyze Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations.",

      "[PaperAnalyst] Find academic papers that predict or analyze Samsung Electronics stock price fluctuations."
    ],
